author: Eddy Parham
text: We are currently revamping our onboarding processes and are wondering what other municipal governments are doing in the area of onboarding?  If you have a formal process, I would be appreciative if you would share them or I'd love to talk with you - feel free to either post here or you can email be directly at parhare@ci.danville.va.us
title: Onboarding
